select t1.programakey,t1.articlekey,t1.replykey,t1.replycontent,t1.auditstat, t1.flag,t1.creator,t1.createdate,t1.modifier,t1.modifydate,t2.realname from t12_writeback t1,t00_user t2
t1.programakey = #programakey#
t1.articlekey = #articlekey#
t1.auditstat = #auditstat#
t1.auditstat in ($auditstats$)
and t1.creator = t2.username order by t1.modifydate desc

select count(*) from t12_writeback t1,t00_user t2
t1.programakey = #programakey#
t1.articlekey = #articlekey#
t1.auditstat = #auditstat#
t1.auditstat in ($auditstats$)
and t1.creator = t2.username
update T12_writeback set auditstat=#auditstat#,modifier=#modifier#,modifydate=#modifydate# where programakey=#programakey# and articlekey=#articlekey# and replykey=#replykey#
update T12_writeback set replycontent =($replycontent$),modifier=#modifier#,modifydate=#modifydate# where programakey=#programakey# and articlekey=#articlekey# and replykey=#replykey#
delete from T12_writeback where articlekey=#articlekey# and programakey=#programakey# and replykey=#replykey#
select * from T12_writeback where articlekey=#articlekey# and programakey=#programakey# and replykey=#replykey#
